description: One of the biggest challenges in design responsive websites and applications is creating and communicating design systems so we and our client teams — developers, designers, brand and business owners, and most especially QA teams — all understand and can implement them effectively. We’ll take a practical look at tools, techniques and deliverables to help articulate important ideas, and the new mental models that will help teams work effectively together toward robust and effective design solutions.
title: Design Consistency for the Responsive Web
